# cargar paquetes

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse) # manejad datos
library(mapview) # mapas facil
library(readxl) #leer datos

source("D:/BoxFiles/Box Sync/CodigoR/tigrinus/R/organizadato.R")
```
:::


# cargar datos


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
Full_data <- read_excel("D:/BoxFiles/Box Sync/CodigoR/tigrinus/data/Full_data_Ucumari_Huila_Cocha1_Cocha2.xlsx", 
    sheet = "ucumari", col_types = c("numeric", 
        "text", "text", "text", "text", "text", 
        "text", "text", "text", "text", "text", 
        "text", "text", "text", "text", "numeric", 
        "text", "text", "text", "text", "text", 
        "text", "text", "text", "text", "numeric", 
        "numeric", "numeric", "numeric", 
        "text"))
```
:::


# crerar matrices para unmarked


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
Full_data$binomial <- str_c (Full_data$Genus, "_", Full_data$Species)

#funcion para crear todas las tablas de datos
all_data <-  f.matrix.creator2 (Full_data)
names(all_data) # ver lass especies y en que lista esta cada una
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```{.r .cell-code}
# Tigrinus es lista 8
```
:::



# unmarked

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
# tabla con solo tiginus
tigrinus <- all_data[[8]]
# cargar paquete
library(unmarked)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Warning: package 'unmarked' was built under R version 4.0.5
```
:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Loading required package: lattice
```
:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Warning: package 'lattice' was built under R version 4.0.5
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# crear objeto umf
umf_tigrinus <- unmarkedFrameOccu(y=tigrinus)
# verificar datos en grafica
plot(umf_tigrinus)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](ensayo1_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
# modelo nulo
fm <- occu(~1 ~1, umf_tigrinus)  # fit a model

backTransform(fm, type="det") # estimado lineal de deteccion
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Backtransformed linear combination(s) of Detection estimate(s)

 Estimate      SE LinComb (Intercept)
   0.0184 0.00977   -3.98           1

Transformation: logistic 
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
backTransform(fm, type="state") # estimado linel de ocupacion
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Backtransformed linear combination(s) of Occupancy estimate(s)

 Estimate     SE LinComb (Intercept)
    0.198 0.0968    -1.4           1

Transformation: logistic 
```
:::
:::
